  • Case Study

    Bush Intercontinental Airport Piping Project

    In February 2011, the Houston Airport System (HAS) discovered that chilled water lines were leaking 31 feet below ground at a rate of 10,000 gallons of treated water per day.

    More Info

Quality People. Building Solutions.

HVAC - Plumbing - Electrical 

Mtech has been honored to work for the central Texas business community for over 25 years. We are committed to understanding our customers' businesses so we can anticipate their needs.

Our technical experts design, install and fine-tune Building Systems for downtown high rises, hospitals, universities and hotels. We're also behind the scenes at data centers and manufacturing facilities. With over 150 Licensed HVAC Technicians, Installers, Plumbers and Electricians we have the capacity and experience to handle any project or emergency.

Mtech joined Comfort Systems USA in 1999, giving us additional resources to help our local customers.
